intro: Jossinia ferruginea, commonly known as the rusty jossinia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of Africa. The plant typically grows as an herbaceous perennial, often reaching heights of up to 1 meter. Jossinia ferruginea is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and greenhouses due to its vibrant blooms and unique foliage.
